The Benefits of Small Business IT Outsourcing Services

To get to the top, your small business IT Company will need to get IT support services. In getting these services, you should not just use any support service. You should get one that can provide your IT Company with a business solution that offers the best software and technical support Melbourne services available. With Intellekt, your small business IT Company will get the reliable support services it needs to keep it running seamlessly.

If your small business IT Company is located in Melbourne and it requires reliable IT support services that are also affordable, Intellekt can help. With their highly qualified and experienced business IT support team, you will get the most effective tools, systems, and IT support services as the solution for your IT business needs. With their business IT support services, you will be provided with various benefits for your company such as:

1. Immediate Onsite IT Network Support
Whether your company needs installation, maintenance, and other IT support services, the business IT support company will provide you with fast and efficient onsite IT support. With Intellekt, you will get various IT support services available such as a network upgrade, back up and data recovery, IT security, and other IT support solutions.

2. Affordable Technical Support Melbourne package
With the package offered by Intellekt, you will no longer have to worry about slow computers, viruses infecting your computers, and updates to your workstations and servers. Your small business IT Company will be provided with fixed price business IT support services and weekly updates to the software and network security, which will be done by a professional IT team.

So if you want to reduce costs for IT support and at the same time get the best support for your small business IT Company, consider getting outsourcing support services from Intellekt.

To get more information about Intellekt, please visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/

Reasons for Getting Business IT Support Services

When it comes to managing a small business IT company, you are given the option of either managing your own IT staff or getting outsourcing services from IT companies such as Intellekt. Having your own IT staff has its good points. However, getting IT outsourcing support services for your company also has its advantages. With more IT support companies offering business IT support solutions for companies, outsourcing your IT staff has become a more viable alternative to employing your own IT staff.

When you outsource your IT staff for your small business IT Company, you would no longer have to worry about providing salary and training for your IT staff. With Intellekt, an IT companies Melbourne support services provider, you will be provided with a highly experienced IT team who can help you manage your IT department at a flat fee. Here are some of the reasons on why other medium or small business IT companies have chosen Intellekt for their business:

1. Cost-Effective Services
At Intellekt, you will be offered a flat rate for a project and they can provide a complete business IT support solution for your company. With their flat rate managed IT support solution, you can expect affordable, quality IT support services for your small business IT company.

2. Full Time Support
When you get business IT support services from Intellekt, you can expect them to be available 24 hours each day throughout the year. If you have a problem that requires immediate support, Intellekt will be there to provide you with a quick response within only 30 minutes.

3. Dedicated and Experienced IT Staff
Providing IT support services, their IT staff are highly trained and updated with the latest developments in the IT industry to provide you with dedicated business IT support . At Intellekt, their qualified IT staffs regularly maintain their vendor certifications. With over 10 years of experience, their IT staff will provide you with exceptional IT support services for your small business IT company.

So if you are managing a small business IT Company, consider outsourcing your IT staff with Intellekt for their cost-effective services, full time support, and dedicated IT staff. To learn more about the IT support services offered by Intellekt, visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/it-support.html

How Small Business IT Services Can Help Your Company

As the manager of an IT services Melbourne Company, you can anticipate unexpected situations to occur. The computers, printers or server in your company may suddenly encounter technical or software issues, and none of your employees may know how to fix it. The challenge then would be what you can do to solve it. You could wait for business IT support specialists to come fix it for you. However, would it be beneficial for your business?

Just a few hours of waiting may greatly affect your small business IT company. There is a much better and quicker way of tackling this challenge and that is by getting immediate business IT support from professional IT companies such as Intellekt.

Having been in the IT industry for over a decade now, Intellekt can provide you with prompt small business IT support solutions for your company. Aside from getting the IT support your business needs, you can also get the chance to greatly improve the productivity of your small business IT Company by over 20%.

When your employees encounter bugs in using their software, Intellekt’s IT consultants Melbourne staff can provide your company with support on repairing the computer. If the server managing your files, e-mails and database is facing issues, it may be a sign to fix your server, change the setup, and give the network an upgrade. With their IT network support specialists, you can be at ease knowing that they will perform the right setup, and use the best hardware for your computer system network and the boost it needs.

Being a small business IT Company, it may be natural for your company to have a couple of servers running. Although this is the usual scenario, you can change this and have only one server to use. As compared to 5 years ago, new servers are now much more powerful. With the IT companies Melbourne company, Intellekt, you can lessen your maintenance and operations costs, and get better performance through server virtualization.

If your business is in need of small business IT support services or you want to outsource staff to manage your IT system, visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/

Upgrade Your Company with IT Consultants Melbourne

As your business grows, the challenge of managing your small business IT department will also increase. With the new advancements and trends in the field of information technology, your company will also need to update itself with these developments. With the day to day tasks that must be accomplished, most of your employees will not have enough time to focus on learning about new technologies. With business IT support consultants, you can immediately solve all of your IT related concerns with their expert advice. If you are in Melbourne and you need immediate response for your IT needs, Intellekt’s skilled IT consultants Melbourne can help you. With them as your consultants, you will immediately get the answers you need to effectively manage and improve the current IT system of your company.

One of main problems that most small business IT companies face is not the equipment itself but the inadequate design of the network to meet the IT needs of your company. If your company is experiencing slow internet or mail services, Intellekt’s IT consultants Melbourne will recommend that you get a network design upgrade.

Their IT consultants Melbourne will evaluate the IT network and the servers. These would include network security, data recovery and backup, and speed or performance. After the evaluation, their IT consultants Melbourne will then provide you with the needed steps to improve your IT system network.

With a high performance network, your business will have minimal to non-existent server downtime. At the click of the mouse, your emails will be sent instantly. Backing up your data will no longer be a concern since their business IT support specialists will provide you with more than enough space to save and load all your files in the server.

If you are not satisfied with your current computer network, let professional IT consultants Melbourne help you. To learn more about Intellekt and their IT support services, please visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/

Outsourcing: the Key in Staying Ahead of the Game

To thrive in today’s competitive business landscape means cutting your expenses in half while doubling your profits.

This current business mindset holds true when it comes to making sure your business stays on top of the competition. That is why companies and firms are now outsourcing their back end needs like IT network support, computer installation and others to cut on overhead costs.

The Ultimate Benefit of Outsourcing network Support Melbourne

Aside from cutting your expenditures in half, outsourcing your small business IT needs means you can focus more on what you do best. And that is running your business. Moreover, you will not also be troubled on maintaining an IT network support infrastructure and spend resources on IT training. With outsourcing, you can now maximize your limited funds and invest it so your company can earn more.

Finding the Right Outsourcing IT Services Company

There are many reliable outsourcing IT services companies out there. And currently, the most preferred technical support Melbourne provider today is Intellekt.

Intellekt is a professional Business IT Support Company which specialises in providing reliable and inexpensive IT network support to small and medium-sized businesses throughout Melbourne.

The company can give you the most appropriate and effective business IT support tools and systems at incredibly affordable rates. With them, you will be able to experience personal and professional service by an IT team qualified and experienced to help you run your IT department.

Their prompt assistance with IT Support Melbourne issues ranging from computer installation and repair, to backup solutions, virus protection and IT network support will allow you to:

>> Say goodbye to the cost of a full-time IT staff member or team because Intellekt will provide you the best IT network support.

>> Stop relying on your current staff to manage your IT systems. You will have peace of mind knowing that your Network Support Melbourne needs are handled by experts.

Best of all, Intellekt lets you get 2 hours of FREE IT network Support services so you can decide for yourself.

Call Intellekt today on 1300 450 450 or log on to http://www.intellekt.com.au/

Who is Taking Care of Your Company Data?

Do not wait until it is too late to discover that your back-up systems is not working.

Like most companies, back-up is probably one of the least considered aspects of your small business IT support system. Indeed, it is tiresome to change tapes, check logs and reports as well as run restore checks daily to make sure your back up system is actually working.

So how can you be sure that no matter what happens to your server or workstations, your data is always protected?

Simple. Get the best business IT support team to look after your company’s assets.

Presently, Intellekt is the leading IT Services Company renowned for their professional IT consultants Melbourne who can offer you the right IT network support solution for your back up needs.

Their Backup and Disaster Recovery Business IT support solution is a simple yet comprehensive solution for your critical business data and applications. Intellekt ensures your backups will run effectively every day and that the backed up data can be restored easily if necessary.

Moreover, Intellekt IT services Melbourne guarantees to:

Safeguard your entire Windows based system

Your data is safe regardless of how your computer systems are set up. Their Backup and Disaster Recovery Business IT support solution covers Exchange, SQL, MYOB, Quickbooks and all files on a Windows based system.

Run daily back-ups to keep your data current

Back-ups are run daily and when Intellekt’s IT Network support system detects changes in files or directories it automatically backs this data up accordingly.

Secure your data with Military Strength Protection

Your data is protected with offsite storage to the super secure Australian Data Centre. Your data is also encrypted with AES 256 bit industry standard algorithm to offer your data the best protection.

Peace of mind with one simple solution

Intellekt’s IT network support system covers desktops, laptops and servers so there is only one backup system to manage. The company also provides monthly reports confirming that the back-ups have been checked and a test restore has been performed.

Avail of their 14 day FREE trial of IT Network Support Backup and Disaster Recovery system.

Call on 1300 450 450 or visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/back-up-data-recovery.html

Thin Clients: The Rising Desktop Virtualization Trend

A year ago, the concept of thin clients were not known and does not even pop up in IT network support or desktop virtualization discussions. However, as business IT support customers become increasingly more sophisticated, the realization of thin clients is now of great importance.

What are thin clients?

Thin clients are computing devices that function as an access device on a network. These solid-state devices connect over an IT network support system to a server where the bulk of the processing takes place.

They have no hard drive, allowing for more secure storage of data and applications on the server. In fact, keystrokes, mouse events and screen images are all that is sent between the client and server. This makes them a more secure business IT support system.

Ultimate Benefit:

Lower total cost of ownership

With a longer useful lifespan, thin clients contribute to cost savings. According to a study by Gartner (TCO Comparison of PCs with Server-Based Computing, June 2006) thin client small business IT TCO annual savings have been measured as high as:

>> 79% less downtime cost per user
>> 16% capital cost savings
>> 34% less in maintenance
>> 19% less to operate
>> 48% overall lower total cost

When to consider a thin client solution?

Thin clients are the right business IT support solution for businesses concerned with:

>> Desktop replacement costs
>> IT Network Support Security
>> Data Access to mobile or remote workers
>> Supporting application software on diverse hardware
>> Ensuring business data remains accessible and secure 24/7

Moreover, thin clients are said to be an ideal solution for today's healthcare, industrial, retail, financial and education industries.

To know more about thin clients desktop virtualization, call Intellekt – the leading IT Consultants Melbourne and Business IT support provider on 1300 450 450 or visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/thin-client-desktop-virtualisation.html

IT companies Melbourne interested in getting IT support can get the free service. They can avail the onsite IT support service for 2 hours from Intellekt without any cost. After that, they can then decide on whether they want to get business IT support from Intellekt.

One of their technicians is sent onsite to provide the free onsite IT support service. At the company, the technician can provide IT network support for network related concerns. The technician can check the network configuration to see if it is correctly configured.

The technician can also provide computer technical business IT support. The technician can optimize the speed of their computers and show them how to do it. The technician can also clean the computers along with its keyboard and screen. The technician can also check on whether the data on the computers have been backed up.

With Intellekt, IT companies Melbourne are ensured that they are 100% satisfied with the IT support service that they receive. As a provider of IT support solutions, they provide a wide range of business IT support solutions that will ensure the optimum performance of computer systems.

To avail the special free onsite support offer and to find out more about their IT support services, please call 1300 450 450 or visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/2-free-hours.html

Intellekt can Help SMEs Save Money on Maintaining Multiple S

September 29, 2010 – Victoria, Australia – one of the IT Companies Melbourne which offers efficient and reliable IT network support services – Intellekt – has offered server virtualisation services to help SME’s save money on maintaining and supporting multiple servers.

“Have you considered how much you spend on maintaining several servers each year as well as the energy consumption and associated costs?” by Intellekt.

“With server virtualisation, each of your servers can be combined and hosted on one powerful server which can offer better performance than you are currently experiencing.”

According to Intellekt, the true beauty of virtual server technology is that IT services Melbourne are run by 2 physical machines.

“When a single physical server fails or needs servicing, the other physical server will automatically pick up the slack. By straddling multiple servers, your business will never be down because of a single hardware failure.”

Moreover, server virtualization business IT support services, businesses can also benefit from a disaster recovery plan.

This means that businesses can fully recover through Active Directory and Exchange Server in less than an hour by rebuilding the virtual server from the Virtual Server image.

Tips for Choosing Reliable Business IT Support Services

As the owner of a medium or small business IT Company in Melbourne, you would find it more cost effective to outsource IT support services rather than hiring IT staff to form an IT support department within your company. By outsourcing your business IT support, you can get excellent technical and IT network support at a more affordable cost.

Nowadays, you can find a lot of IT Services Company providing IT support services. Before you choose one, you will need to check on whether you can really rely on their business IT support services to answer the IT needs of your company. To help you choose the best IT support specialists out there, here are some tips to guide you:

1. Search for local IT support specialists
Although you can get business IT support services from specialists in other areas, it is more preferable to choose a specialist within your area for local onsite support. With your IT Company being located in Melbourne, you can get the support services that you need from IT services Melbourne specialists like Intellekt.

While some IT concerns in your company can be solved with remote IT support, some of them will need onsite IT support to properly resolve them. With Intellekt, you can immediately get onsite technical and IT network support by calling them.

2. Examine the type of services they offer
You may also find many IT services Melbourne support specialists within your local area. You will need to check their services and see if they match with the current business IT support needs of your company. If your company is in need of network upgrade, VOIP, data backup, email security, and server virtualisation solutions, you can let the IT support specialists at Intellekt provide them for you.

So when getting business IT support services for your company, choose reliable IT support specialists like Intellekt.

Server Virtualization: Cutting your Multiple Server Hosting

Does your business have multiple servers for various applications? Did you know that you can just have one server for all of these and enjoy a more convenient and fast performing server?
Yes, you read it right.
With the need to cut technical cost without sacrificing quality and dependability, you need a business IT support option that could help you cut your IT cost. And presently, Intellekt, one of the most trusted IT companies Melbourne has offered the perfect alternative to resolve this challenge. And that is through server virtualization.
With server virtualization, each of your servers will be combined and hosted on one high performing and powerful server which can provide better performance than from what you are currently experiencing.
The best thing about virtual technology is that small business IT services are run in 2 different physical machines. So when one physical server fails or needs servicing, the other automatically picks up the slack.
Furthermore, IT network support virtualization has a built-in disaster recovery plan. If something untoward should happen, the virtualized small business IT server images can be fully and instantly restored. Even the active directory and exchange server can be retrieved in less than an hour by rebuilding the virtual server from the virtual server image.
So just imagine how much you can save with only one small business IT server to maintain, support and power. The annual hardware maintenance cost alone on your old business IT support server and hardware would be enough to pay for all of the new hardware!
Moreover, you will also have a cleaner IT network support server room after the migration. Thus, server virtualization can also give you more room for your growing small business IT data and technology requirements.
Discover how your business can benefit from business IT support server virtualization service. You can even try it for 2 hours FREE!
Call 1300 450 450 or log on to http://www.intellekt.com.au/server-virtualisation.html for more information.

Intellekt Provides a Free 14 Day Trial Backup Solution for I

September 29, 2010 – Victoria, Australia – Intellekt – a professional IT support company supported by an experienced IT Consultants Melbourne and IT support team to provide Melbourne businesses with highly efficient and affordable support solutions, has offered a free trial backup solution for 14 days.

As said by Intellekt, “It is Time to Make Your Data Safe.” With the free trial backup solution, Melbourne Companies can get the business IT support that they need to protect valuable company data. Their secure backup online solution can provide IT companies Melbourne with 14 days of professional IT support service to take care of their company data.

During the 14 days, IT companies Melbourne are provided with support services to protect their windows based system. Their experienced IT support staff can provide IT companies Melbourne with daily backups of their data for peace of mind. With the daily backup, companies are always prepared to recover their valuable data anytime in case of data loss events.

With the business IT support service, Melbourne companies can restore accidentally deleted files with the daily data backups provided by Intellekt’s IT support staff. Server files that were erased by a virus can be restored immediately with the data backup solution. Their business IT support staff can make sure that the backed up data are always available and updated to immediately restore any lost data.

When getting data backup solutions, Intellekt says to “Get The Best Team Looking After Your Precious Company Assets.” To support this statement, they provided a free trial for their business IT support backup solution. Melbourne companies can check the quality of the backup solution provided by Intellekt. After the trial, IT companies Melbourne can then decide on whether to continue availing the data backup IT support service from Intellekt.

They can ensure IT companies Melbourne that their data is always protected regardless of what happens to their server or workstations.
To inquire or avail of the free 14 day data backup solution, please call 1300 450 450 or visit http://www.intellekt.com.au/
